products_data.description: Face lift in a bottle! Look 10 to 15 years younger in minutes! Apply to fine lines and wrinkles. Dries quickly and lasts for hours. Wear under makeup or alone. Used by top models and celebrities! .5 oz.

products_data.description: Removes unwanted hair in just 4 minutes!With a few easy brush strokes, unwanted hair disappears in minutes from your upper lip, chin, cheeks and hair line. Gentle cream dissolves hair just below the skin surface, leaving skin feeling silky soft. Safe on sensitive skin. Has no chemical smell. 1.8 oz.
products_data.title: HairOff® Facial Hair Remover

products_data.description: An instant lift for eyes! Sudden Change serum helps lift away the look of lines, wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles in just 3 minutes. Apply a few drops to under-eye area for astonishing results. Lasts all day. Use under makeup or alone. .23 oz.

products_data.description: No more wrinkles! Erase lines and wrinkles within 2-3 minutes! This safe and natural alternative to Botox® fills in wrinkles and plumps expression lines, restoring a more youthful-looking skin. Lasts all day. 1 oz. *Botox® is a registered trademark of Allergan, Inc.
products_data.title: Wrinkle Free Perfection™ Serum

products_data.description: Works with all skin types, all tones, all ages Simply brush on and go! products_data.description: 1 for $7.98 2 or more for $7.49 each WRITE YOUR OWN LEGAL WILL!Do-it-yourself kit gives you everything you need to write a will that's legally valid in all 50 states. Did you know that without a will, the state decides who gets what? Written by an attorney, the kit contains a fact booklet on wills, easy-to-follow instructions and a fill-in-the-blanks will. Don't put it off!Plan For the Future With Your Own Legal Will KitWe all have goals to take care of our families for as long as we can. By taking the right steps, we can give our children, siblings, and other family members the resources they need for the rest of their lives. But what steps do you have to take to get there? Legal will kits from Harriet Carter walk you through the will-writing process and mak e it simple. Within the span of one day, you can become prepared for the future.Benefits of Purchasing a Will KitWill kits ultimately help you decide who gets what, what you want to give away, and how everything will be distributed. In fact, when you write a will, you can protect your family from certain issues. And when you purchase a will kit, you get everything you need to write a will that is legally valid in all 50 states. Even if you don't know what to do or where to start, the materials in the kit can help you through it. What's in a Legal Will Kit?This do-it-yourself kit was written by an attorney to ensure that it is valid, legally sound, and laid out accurately. It includes:Fact booklet on wills Easy-to-follow instructions Fill-in -the-blanks willYou'll have everything you need to accurately complete your will, free of stress. All you have to do is learn the facts, follow simple instructions, and write everything you need in the blanks.Harriet Carter's Legal Will Kit Fast delivery, peace of mind, and assurance - those are the three main things you.ll receive when you order a legal will kit. Order online to create your own will in no time and protect your family down the line.
products_data.title: Will Kit

products_data.description: Shampoo that curls as it cleans Just shampoo in Curl & Wave to clean your hair and add soft curls all in one step. Cuts down on costly permanents. Contains protein to help prevent splitting and frizzing. Safe for tinted, dyed or bleached hair. 8 oz.

products_data.description: Look Younger Today! You have to see it to believe it! Wrinkles, puffy eyes, crows feet, droopy chin and turkey neck all begin to diminish in appearance when you apply this wonderful formula. Contains honey and soothing chamomile. Lightly fragranced. 2.25 oz.
products_data.title: Youth Formula Beauty Cream
